sentence.Network_en: Ships with square sails sail fairly efficiently with the wind abaft.
sentence.Network_cn: 装着横帆的船只随风疾驰.

sentence.Network_en: Be careful the mule is a vicious beast, not safe abaft the beam.
sentence.Network_cn: 当心,骡子是一种险恶的畜牲, (站在)它后面不安全.

sentence.Network_en: The huge bull caught him abaft the wheel - house and slammed him in the air.
sentence.Network_cn: 那头巨大的公牛抵住他的后腰将他抛到空中.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 船舶专业英语 - 豆丁网 ... abaft the beam 正横后 abaft 在船尾 abaft 在船尾在……后面.
造船专业英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... 干舱 Dry tank 朝向船体 abaft 可调螺距式 adjustable-pitch.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... Abaddon 地狱 abaft 向船尾 abalienate 移转.
航海英语词典1 - 豆丁网 ... abaft 在船尾 abaft 在船尾在……后面 abalienate 连渡.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'backwards'): from a- (expressing motion) + archaic baft 'in the rear'

means.word_mean: 1. at or near or toward the stern of a ship or tail of an airplane;

sentences.sentence: "ships with square sails sail fairly efficiently with the wind abaft"
"the captain looked astern to see what the fuss was about"
